content: @Rob Hausam / @Giorgio Cangioli are there any current plans to update the IPS to support R4B / R5?
IPS shouldn't be impacted by R4B at all...
Correct - we're not looking at R4B. But we will begin looking at R5 - the question is when.

Unless an IG has an urgent need for new features in R5 (in which case they might time their release to coincide with the initial publication of R5), most will wait until R5 is stable before doing the analysis work to avoid building on a moving target.
My concern is the MedicationStatement in R4 vs MedicationUsage in R5
It is likely there will be some breaking changes between IPS based on FHIR R4 vs. R5. MedicationUsage is likely the most significant of these.
@Craig Anderson :point_up: there is our answer

We need to start preparing ourselves for how we want to deal with this. It's been on the radar for quite a while, at least in terms of awareness - but we need to begin thinking about and working more on our strategy.
